column2: "Hey partner. I'm alright, just leave this to me."

"Nope, I can't do that, Lida.
You're my sister, after all."
"I'm a Dark Falz. Dark Falz [Apprentice]. Enemy to all ARKS."
"Please, stop this, Lida. You don't need to keep on pretending."
"You knew, didn't you, deep down. Even before [Double] said it, you knew something was wrong."
"Sure, other Dark Falz can control Darkers, but when it comes to a battle, they fight in person using their battle forms."
"But you didn't, Lida. To the very end you only commanded Darkers, you never decided to fight yourself."
"...No, that's not quite it. You couldn't join the fight, could you? You didn't have that power."
"What do you know... You... What could you possibly understand?!"
"I'm asking because I don't understand! If I'm wrong, then correct me! And I'll do my best to understand you more!"
"You saw that, partner. She didn't deny a single word I said."
"Honestly, it's just like her to run away when she feels guilty."
